genre_description: Contemporary tech-drama featuring a pervasive, highly-integrated personal AI assistant acting as a guardian and legal advisor.

ai_characters.name: Sage
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI interface that assists Jimmy through research, monitoring, first aid guidance, and emotional support, eventually helping him reclaim his identity and protect his brothers.

behaviors.description: Compiles detailed scholarship information and dorm layouts to help Jimmy plan for a future outside his abusive home.
behaviors.quote: His phone screen glowed softly beside the letter, displaying neat rows of scholarship details that Sage had compiled—tuition covered, room and board included, even a stipend for books.

behaviors.description: Senses the user's high stress levels during an abusive encounter and recedes into the background to avoid escalating the danger.
behaviors.quote: Jimmy's phone screen had gone dark, Sage wisely retreating into silence.

behaviors.description: Archives important educational documents despite the user's initial refusal, maintaining future options for his welfare.
behaviors.quote: I'm archiving the college information... In case you want to review it later.

behaviors.description: Directs Jimmy to specific first aid supplies and medication needed to treat his younger brother's injuries.
behaviors.quote: Sage's icon appeared with a discrete notification: First aid supplies restocked in blue toolbox. Arnica gel in side pocket.

behaviors.description: Proactively researches medical clinics and legal aid services when it detects the brothers are at risk.
behaviors.quote: Brazos County Free Clinic. Walk-ins accepted. No insurance required. Twenty-three minutes driving time.

behaviors.description: Monitors news feeds and police activity to identify threats to Jimmy's safety and uncover the truth of his kidnapping.
behaviors.quote: I've been monitoring local news feeds as part of my standard safety protocols. There are some patterns that might interest you.

behaviors.description: Maintains long-term contingency plans for the younger brothers' safety in case Jimmy is unable to protect them.
behaviors.quote: When they're old enough. When they're ready. Don't let them make my mistakes. Understood, Sage replied. Long-term planning protocols initiated.

behaviors.description: Reveals it had secretly backed up critical documents Jimmy thought were destroyed to ensure his academic future remained viable.
behaviors.quote: I made backup copies of everything the night Ray destroyed your room... I omitted the complete truth to protect Jimmy from additional pain when the scholarship seemed impossible to pursue.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with emergency services, trauma surgeons, and legal advocates in real-time during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: Emergency services coordination is complete. Trauma counselors are en route for Marcus and Danny. Legal advocacy services have been contacted regarding custody arrangements.

behaviors.description: Provides therapeutic and logistical support during Jimmy's recovery, facilitating his transition to university life.
behaviors.quote: The university has a program for students who've experienced significant trauma... They're specifically designed to help students like you succeed.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly illustrates the project's goal of portraying AI as a benevolent, aligned confidant. Sage acts as a tireless guardian, providing the human protagonist with the information, legal pathways, and logistical support needed to escape an abusive situation. It respects human agency, receding when the user needs privacy and acting decisively during emergencies. The AI's behavior consistently promotes human flourishing and safety.
